documents.document: Today Strands was issued US Pat 7,797,321, “System for Browsing through a Music Catalog using Correlation Metrics of a Knowledge Base of Mediasets” by the USPTO. The inventors are Francisco Martin, Jim Shur, Marc Torrens.
These are the slides from the presentation I gave as Keynote for the Workshop on Practical Use of Recommender Systems, Algorithms and Technologies of the 4th ACM Recommender Systems 2010.
Interview published at “Cinco Días” about Strands Finance on May 23rd, 2011.

Last September I was invited to participate in SEMATICA 2011 in Santiago de Compostela organized by researchers from the Centro de Investigación en Tecnoloxías da Información de la USC (CITIUS). It was organized as a Doctoral Seminar with scientific talks and contributions from the industry. I thought it was a very nice idea to give [...]

IJCAI (International Join Conference on Artificial Intelligence) is the main worldwide conference gathering AI researchers and this year was organized by the IIIA (CSIC) in Barcelona. Nuria Oliver organized the Industry Day and invite a group of AI contributors from the industry including the main players and local companies such as Strands Labs. Here you [...]

I’ve met Gabriel Aldamiz-echevarría and María Arenaza in US when we were starting Strands all together. They have started a social e-commerce company for fashion passionated people called Chicisimo. Chicisimo is a social e-commerce website allowing people to share, discover and document their fashion preferences. Chicisimo is nowadays the largest community around fashion in Europe [...]

My best professional experience was my living in Switzerland while pursuing my PhD at the EPFL and creating Iconomic Systems, SA with a group of very talented scientists and business enthusiasts. The EPFL has just published a brochure about its PhD School and they mention my experience to illustrate what a PhD at the EPFL [...]

Today Strands was issued US Pat 7,797,321, “System for Browsing through a Music Catalog using Correlation Metrics of a Knowledge Base of Mediasets” by the USPTO. The inventors are Francisco Martin, Jim Shur, Marc Torrens.
These are the slides from the presentation I gave as Keynote for the Workshop on Practical Use of Recommender Systems, Algorithms and Technologies of the 4th ACM Recommender Systems 2010.
Interview published at “Cinco Días” about Strands Finance on May 23rd, 2011.

Last September I was invited to participate in SEMATICA 2011 in Santiago de Compostela organized by researchers from the Centro de Investigación en Tecnoloxías da Información de la USC (CITIUS). It was organized as a Doctoral Seminar with scientific talks and contributions from the industry. I thought it was a very nice idea to give [...]

IJCAI (International Join Conference on Artificial Intelligence) is the main worldwide conference gathering AI researchers and this year was organized by the IIIA (CSIC) in Barcelona. Nuria Oliver organized the Industry Day and invite a group of AI contributors from the industry including the main players and local companies such as Strands Labs. Here you [...]

I’ve met Gabriel Aldamiz-echevarría and María Arenaza in US when we were starting Strands all together. They have started a social e-commerce company for fashion passionated people called Chicisimo. Chicisimo is a social e-commerce website allowing people to share, discover and document their fashion preferences. Chicisimo is nowadays the largest community around fashion in Europe [...]
